page.title: 05Normanby Hall Country Park-3
page.content: As a centre for recreation Normanby Park caters for many preferences. During the summer a firm favourite with visiters and local children is the swimming pool.Another firm favourite is the stables and horse riding school.Here riders from raw novices to experienced,accomplished riders can receive coaching.In a quiet area of the park some distance from most visitors is the fishing lake where coarse fish such as roach,perch, bream and pike may be caught.Sports such as golf,squash,cricket and hockey are catered for.There is a fine golf course with a clubhouse and restaurant .The cricket and hockey clubs enter teams in the local leagues.A part of the Park is used by camping and caravanning clubs for rallies. Winterton Comprehensive School use the park each year for camping.
